name: node
description: In this lab you will implement the Utah cities suggestions RESTful service in Node.js that connects to your cities application from ["Activity V3: Vue with REST Calls"](https://github.com/BYUCS260/Vue-REST).  You will take a URL with a ?q=chars suffix and will look up all of the utah cities that have those chars as a prefix. You will then return a JSON string corresponding to the entries.
